name: Tabs: Safari 4 way
description:
Tab bar in Safari 4 way.  This completes the series of Safari 4 way.  Use all for extreme mimicking of Safari 4.
style 18000
style 19500 or style 17818

REQUIRES:
GrApple Yummy theme @ https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/6704

NOTE:
ONLY works with Firefox 3.5.  Does NOT work with versions prior to 3.5.

2009.06.20: NO changes.  Just organized the code. [100]
2009.06.13: FIXED tab positioning and small tweaks. Thanks to user 23447 [16]
2009.06.12: Initial release.
